item.description: Looking to turn 40 on the peak of Washington! Help me welcome in the next 40 by taking a day off to climb Mt. Washington via the Ammonoosuc Ravine trail.   I'll be in a White Toyota 4Runner (NH Plate: LATITUD).  Cell: 603-438-6020
item.how_to_find_us: contact Paul by cell phone before start time. Remeber $3 or annual pass is needed for parking
item.name: Climb Mt. Washington on the 18th to celebrate my 40th!
